title: Kraftwerk's Electronic Classic Pocket Calculator Gets 2009 Remaster
summary: Kraftwerk's synthesizer song Pocket Calculator receives digital remastering in 2009.
content:
• Originally performed by German electronic music pioneers Kraftwerk
• Song features repetitive lyrics about using a calculator
• Notable for merging technology themes with electronic music
• Remastered version released in 2009
• Approximately 4 minutes and 57 seconds in length
• Lyrics focus on mathematical operations and electronic control
